column4: anyone know how to get Guild Wars running on ubuntu, I am using Wine 1.1.0 and when I load Guild Wars, screen goes to 800x600 resolution, I get the mouse, but nothing else, no sound, no screen, and I have to manual shutdown and reboot. can someone point me to a guide or explain to me how to fix this please
have u checking winehq.org appdb about the game?
yeah they gave me a .php file, yet didnt tell me what to do with it or any instructions on how to make the game work
guild wars is platinum status so should work flawlessly
it doesnt though, like I said, I get the cursor, the screen goes 800x600 yet nothing else
